title: CPA Backs Plea Deal to Woman Who Threw Object at Mathieu van der Poel’s Wheel
content:
‘I think this is fair’: CPA president Adam Hansen weighs in on spectator who threw cap at Van der Poel’s wheel during Paris-Roubaix.

Read the full article at CPA Backs Plea Deal to Woman Who Threw Object at Mathieu van der Poel’s Wheel on Velo.
author: sstokes
